title: harikathA shravaNa
sahitya:
harikathA shravaNa mADO pADO harikathA shravaNa mADO


anupallavi

  pada vaikuNTHakidu nODO


caraNam 1    sarasija nAbhana sarvadA hOgaLuta durita dUragIDADO
    caraNam 2    dhyAna bhakuti vairAgyavIva namma Ananda tIrttara pADO
    caraNam 3    parama puruSa purandara viTTalana caraNa kamaladali kUDO
